responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "485D249D494BF0ED2F8BE5956036DEF1", "When the Goddess of Creation spun Verra into being, it was Essence that gave it and everything in it the spark of life. Essence is the energy that powers this portal, and all magic, in all the world.\r\nEven the hostile automatons that threaten our efforts to reclaim our home are driven by Essence, in some form.")
name: ANV_FTUE_Dunir_GatewatcherStonebeard_9_Response
